member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilerMarshalOverride
member.summary: Indicates that the modified instance of a variable differs from its true type when marshaling. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CppInlineNamespaceAttribute
member.summary: Defines the inline namespace in C++/CLI.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CppInlineNamespaceAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified dotted namespace name.
member.param: The dotted name of the defined namespace.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.HasCopySemanticsAttribute
member.summary: This class is obsolete. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.HasCopySemanticsAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsBoxed
member.summary: Indicates that the modified reference type is a boxed value type. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsByValue
member.summary: Indicates that a modified method argument should be interpreted as having object passed-by-value semantics. This modifier is applied to reference types. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsCopyConstructed
member.summary: Indicates that any copying of values of this type must use the copy constructor provided by the type. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced
member.summary: Indicates that a managed pointer represents a pointer parameter within a method signature. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsImplicitlyDereferenced
member.summary: Indicates that the modified garbage collection reference represents a reference parameter within a method signature. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsJitIntrinsic
member.summary: Indicates that a modified method is an intrinsic value for which the just-in-time (JIT) compiler can perform special code generation. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsLong
member.summary: Indicates that a modified integer is a standard C++ value. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsPinned
member.summary: Indicates that a modified instance is pinned in memory. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsSignUnspecifiedByte
member.summary: Indicates that a modifier is neither signed nor unsigned. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsUdtReturn
member.summary: Indicates that a return type is a user-defined type. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NativeCppClassAttribute
member.summary: Applies metadata to an assembly that indicates that a type is an unmanaged type. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NativeCppClassAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RequiredAttributeAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that an importing compiler must fully understand the semantics of a type definition, or refuse to use it. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RequiredAttributeAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param:
A type that an importing compiler must fully understand.
This parameter is not supported in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RequiredAttributeAttribute.RequiredContract
member.summary: Gets a type that an importing compiler must fully understand.
member.returns: A type that an importing compiler must fully understand.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ScopelessEnumAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that a native enumeration is not qualified by the enumeration type name. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ScopelessEnumAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
